ISSUE.TITLE: Facing issue while using Monaco editor present in Nocodb
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, I have been trying to use MonacoTsEditor present in Nocodb as code editor instead of normal textarea. Facing below issue while using it ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/86340924/124745086-0da75000-df3d-11eb-9633-8c27a3502541.png) I have used it as below: - import the editor ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/86340924/124745210-32032c80-df3d-11eb-980c-e9dc3f971768.png) - include in component ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/86340924/124745299-49dab080-df3d-11eb-9ca6-409d5a90e69f.png) - use it ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/86340924/124745346-5959f980-df3d-11eb-91f0-b44f51186bf4.png) I tried debugging and found may be web workers are not loading correctly. Currently temporary workaround I am using it is to comment the model initialization. But then code color doesn't come and few features are removed. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/86340924/124746646-befab580-df3e-11eb-845d-b102a023a6fb.png) Overall I am trying to add abstract type code editor where I can store code snippets There is also warning comes when activating few other monaco editor like sql ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/86340924/124747260-5fe97080-df3f-11eb-82f7-3bfc3107e77c.png) It doesn't cause issue in execution but too many cause lag in ui Steps to produce(both for ts and sql editor): - Implement it - Error comes in console when it is activated Node: **v14.15.1** Arch: **x64** Platform: **win32** Docker: **false** Database: **sqlite3** ProjectOnRootDB: **true** RootDB: **sqlite3** PackageVersion: **0.9.41**
